Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1984...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1984, off John Tate (SHP)...
Injured on 6/1/1984 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1986...
Injured on 4/30/1987 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1987, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1987, hitting .354 with 8 HR, 26 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1987, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1988, hitting .625 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (FBA) on 7/26/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1988, hitting .407 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/7/1990 to a 4-year deal worth $5,847,300 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1990, hitting .571 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 4/11/1991 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against Syracuse on 9/22/1991...
